answers.answer: Lol my bf did the same thing my first pregnancy i was in the hospital for it, abd they put me on a super strict diet he would sit there an eat everything i couldnt right infront of me! Lol

This is our second and i just started having tgis problem but he snitched told it all. Then got loud laughing talking sh#%. I told before the dr came in not to say anything but BIG MOUTH was flapping. It funny now because i took all the batteries out of everything and he is whining about not watching the game. Lol

Lol. Well it IS for your health and the babies health after all. But I can see that being annoying. I have gestational diabetes and my hubby snitched on me for my soda habit. I haven't figured a way to get back at him yet.
I listen to the dr. but i don't need my bf telling everything i do.

I hear you. It's annoying. I might drink soda but my blood sugars are fine. Neither my husband nor the doctor believed my so they made me take a blood test last week and it was normal so I win. I'm still grumpy about it though. At least you got him back for it lol
I know he is looking stupid because the batteries are gone. His stupid face is making me laugh. Lol
Aw thats cute though and thoughtful expect eatin in front of u lol
Aww my bf said he snitchin about me eating candy :(

question: Well today i had to go see my dr. and was like you had perfect blood pressure when came to see me last time but today its alittle high so no salt. No salt is like eating cardboard boxes. But the bad part about is my bf is just snitching on me. Like this is the first pregnancy. So i am NEVER letting him talk to the dr. again... Lol
title: SNITCHING and taking my salt away
